title: krogothmanhattan
author: krogothmanhattan
content: Wanted to share this with the rest of you collectors out there! https://bitcoinmagazine.com/business/first-ever-bitcoin-themed-pez-dispenser-to-launch-in-2023As the link says... The worldâ€™s first Bitcoin-themed PEZ dispenser has launched for a limited-edition run, per a press release sent to Bitcoin Magazine.I bought some here>>>Â  https://www.walmart.com/ip/Bitcoin-PEZ-Dispenser-LIMITED-EDITION/1915338112Â Just as Bitcoin has limited supply, so does this Bitcoin PEZ Dispenser. WHILE SUPPLIES LAST!You don't need to HODL this PEZ Dispenser like you would your actual Bitcoin...or do you?â€¢ Limited Edition: Only 30,000 Dispensers Madeâ€¢ Bitcoin Themed PEZ Candy Dispenserâ€¢ A Must-have for any Bitcoin or Crypto enthusiastâ€¢ Includes Three Candy Refills.

comments.author: dolphriends
comments.body: Thanks for the heads up on these, very rare when a major company puts out a bitcoin themed product.Â  Never want to miss out.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: dolphriends on March 23, 2023, 07:41:12 PMThanks for the heads up on these, very rare when a major company puts out a bitcoin themed product.Â  Never want to miss out.Â  Indeed it is!Â  I only wish they wouldve put a head with a mysterious mask to represent Satoshi!Â  Was thinking of creating a custom PEZ with my trademark logo as a head...I think it would look pretty damn cool...better than just a BTC logo

comments.author: av8rjeff
comments.body: Great find!Â  Thank you.Â  Got 3 as well.

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on March 23, 2023, 07:44:45 PMQuote from: dolphriends on March 23, 2023, 07:41:12 PMThanks for the heads up on these, very rare when a major company puts out a bitcoin themed product. Â Never want to miss out.Â Â Indeed it is! Â I only wish they wouldve put a head with a mysterious mask to represent Satoshi!Â Â Was thinking of creating a custom PEZ with my trademark logo as a head...I think it would look pretty damn cool...better than just a BTC logo Â Yes I agree, the Bitcoin logo as iconic as it is now looks a bit basic on that,the anonymous satoshi mask would have been brilliant as well as incorporating the Bitcoin logo and they are well able o do it!https://www.starwars.com/news/star-wars-pez-dispensershttps://www.everythingkiss.com/store/p1394/Pez12.htmlThis is a great release though, great to see them doing something Bitcoin related and something different for the Bitcoin collector.

comments.author: Jambo USA
comments.body: Oh man this is gonna be bad for my wallet. I collect pez dispensers and bitcoin lmao. I have bags full of old dispensers, though not worth much I always get a kick out of them.Edit: just bought 2 of em lmao

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I bought 12 of them - have 3 left (if anyone wants one) - total came to $32 after tax

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: It would be super cool if they are like numbered, like on the package, but we'll see I guess...  Good find, thanks Krog!

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: You guys are killing my DCA today... lolÂ  I just ordered a few as well.Â  Â These will go nicely with the Tic Tac ones!

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Here's an article on this product. They say there will only be 30,000 and that the scarcity mirrors bitcoins. I probably would have gone with 21,000...https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/first-ever-bitcoin-themed-pez-dispenser-officially-launches

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: Markzellers on March 24, 2023, 02:06:10 AMYou guys are killing my DCA today... lolÂ  I just ordered a few as well.Â  Â These will go nicely with the Tic Tac ones! Â  Â  LOL....this post made me laugh.....Thats exactly one of the reasons I bought this Pez.....cause they will go great alongside my Tictac ones as well.Â  Â I also bought a few years back a chocolate theme Bitcoin candy...so they will go perfectly with all my edible Bitcoin related part of my collection

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: Jambo USA on March 23, 2023, 11:55:26 PMOh man this is gonna be bad for my wallet. I collect pez dispensers and bitcoin lmao. I have bags full of old dispensers, though not worth much I always get a kick out of them.Edit: just bought 2 of em lmaoÂ  Â Well it looks like you are a PEZ collector...you should watch this doc/movie I just saw a few weeks back called THE PEZ OUTLAWÂ  Â  https://www.imdb.com/title/tt17660740/Â  Â  Â Its about the PEZ collecting world and this one guy who made a fortune. Never knew how far people were willing to pay for these items until I saw this movie....which kinda got me to buy the Bitcoin themed PEZ to start with.

Iâ€™ll admit I considered buying some of these but at $30 a piece I think theyâ€™re a bit out of my price range for candy. Still a great find though. PEZ always reminds me of the Seinfeld episode with the piano player and the intervention. Great writingâ€¦

I was rooting for him all the time.Â  Â Now I just need to find some of the very rare pez dispensers on the internet somehwere!
